DOC.brief_summary: In preterm infant birth weight less 1500 gram , iron supplementation 2mg/kg/day addition feed routine iron-fortified milk ( formula fortify mother 's milk ) , compare routine iron fortify milk , increase hematocrit 36 week adjust post-menstrual age ( discharge sooner ) ?
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Iron Supplementation Versus Routine Iron Intake Very Low Birth Weight ( VLBW ) Infants
DOC.criteria: Birth weight < 1500 gram Tolerating iron fortify preterm formula fortify human milk 120cc/kg/day 8 week age < /= 32 week adjust postmenstrual age time enrollment Cyanotic heart disease Bowel resection prior enrollment
